id: Bears activate Shaheen, place Sims on injured reserve
paragraph:
CHICAGO (AP) — The Chicago Bears have activated Adam Shaheen from injured reserve and placed fellow tight end Dion Sims on IR.The 6-foot-6 Shaheen has missed the first nine games because of a foot injury.  A second-round draft pick from Division II Ashland in 2017, he caught 12 passes for 127 yards and three touchdowns as a rookie.Sims (concussion) sat out Chicago’s win over Detroit last weekend.Chicago announced the moves on Saturday. The NFC North-leading Bears (6-3) host the second-place Minnesota Vikings (5-3-1) on Sunday night.Help | Press | Advertise With Us | Jobs | RSS | Site Map
